channel.title: Daily Feed (Updated 9 AM BD)

item.title: Turning Indigenous Territories From ‘Sacrifice’ Zones to Thriving Forest Ecosystems
item.description: A new report, 'Indigenous Territories and Local Communities on the Frontlines,' calls for secure land rights, free and informed consent, direct financing to communities, protection of life, and recognition of traditional knowledge.

item.title: Holding on to home, as the ocean engulfs the Solomon Islands
item.description: Morning light spreads over Sikaiana, a remote atoll in the Solomon Islands in the South Pacific where the ocean both sustains life and threatens it.
